name: PHAssetCollectionSubtype
desc: Minor distinctions between kinds of asset collections, used by the assetCollectionSubtype property and the fetchAssetCollections(with:subtype:options:) method.

items.name: case albumRegular
items.desc: An album created in the Photos app.

items.name: case albumSyncedEvent
items.desc: An Event synced to the device from iPhoto.

items.name: case albumSyncedFaces
items.desc: A Faces group synced to the device from iPhoto.

items.name: case albumSyncedAlbum
items.desc: An album synced to the device from iPhoto.

items.name: case albumImported
items.desc: An album imported from a camera or external storage.

items.name: case albumMyPhotoStream
items.desc: The user’s personal iCloud Photo Stream.

items.name: case albumCloudShared
items.desc: An iCloud Shared Photo Stream.

items.name: case smartAlbumGeneric
items.desc: A smart album of no more specific subtype.

items.name: case smartAlbumRAW
items.desc: A smart album that groups all RAW assets in the photo library.

items.name: case smartAlbumPanoramas
items.desc: A smart album that groups all panorama photos in the photo library.

items.name: case smartAlbumVideos
items.desc: A smart album that groups all video assets in the photo library.

items.name: case smartAlbumFavorites
items.desc: A smart album that groups all assets that the user has marked as favorites.

items.name: case smartAlbumTimelapses
items.desc: A smart album that groups all time-lapse videos in the photo library.

items.name: case smartAlbumAllHidden
items.desc: A smart album that groups all assets hidden from the Moments view in the Photos app.

items.name: case smartAlbumRecentlyAdded
items.desc: A smart album that groups assets that were recently added to the photo library.

items.name: case smartAlbumBursts
items.desc: A smart album that groups all burst photo sequences in the photo library.

items.name: case smartAlbumSlomoVideos
items.desc: A smart album that groups all Slow-Mo videos in the photo library.

items.name: case smartAlbumUserLibrary
items.desc: A smart album that groups all assets that originate in the user’s own library (as opposed to assets from iCloud Shared Albums).

items.name: case smartAlbumSelfPortraits
items.desc: A smart album that groups all photos and videos captured using the device’s front-facing camera.

items.name: case smartAlbumScreenshots
items.desc: A smart album that groups all images captured using the device’s screenshot function.

items.name: case smartAlbumDepthEffect
items.desc: A smart album that groups all images captured using the Depth Effect camera mode on compatible devices.

items.name: case smartAlbumLivePhotos
items.desc: A smart album that groups all Live Photo assets.

items.name: case smartAlbumAnimated
items.desc: A smart album that groups all image animation assets.

items.name: case smartAlbumLongExposures
items.desc: A smart album that groups all Live Photo assets where the Long Exposure variation is enabled.

items.name: case smartAlbumUnableToUpload
items.desc: A smart album that groups all assets that the system can’t upload to iCloud.

items.name: case any
items.desc: A bit mask representing all possible subtypes.
